verses.verse: And he looked <S%G308><s%> up, and saw <S%G1492><s%> the rich <S%G4145><s%> men casting <S%G906><s%> their gifts <S%G1435><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the treasury. <S%G1049><s%>
And he saw <S%G1492><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> poor <S%G3998><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> in thither <S%G1563><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> mites. <S%G3016><s%>

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Of a truth <S%G230><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that this <S%G3778><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> has cast <S%G906><s%> in more <S%G4119><s%> than they all: <S%G3956><s%>

For all <S%G537><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> have of their abundance <S%G4052><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> in to the offerings <S%G1435><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but she of her penury <S%G5303><s%> has cast <S%G906><s%> in all <S%G537><s%> the living <S%G979><s%> that she had. <S%G2192><s%>

And as some <S%G5100><s%> spoke <S%G3004><s%> of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> it was adorned <S%G2885><s%> with goodly <S%G2573><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and gifts, <S%G334><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%>

As for these <S%G5023><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> you behold, <S%G2334><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%> in the which <S%G3739><s%> there shall not be left <S%G863><s%> one stone <S%G3037><s%> on another, that shall not be thrown <S%G2647><s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>

And they asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> but when <S%G4218><s%> shall these <S%G5023><s%> things be? and what <S%G5101><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> will there be when <S%G3752><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things shall come <S%G1096><s%> to pass?

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> Take heed <S%G991><s%> that you be not deceived: <S%G4105><s%> for many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in my name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> Christ; and the time <S%G2540><s%> draws near: <S%G1448><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> you not therefore <S%G3767><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> them.

But when <S%G3752><s%> you shall hear <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and commotions, <S%G181><s%> be not terrified: <S%G4422><s%> for these <S%G5023><s%> things must <S%G1163><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> to pass; but the end <S%G5056><s%> is not by and by.

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to them, Nation <S%G1484><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%>

And great <S%G3173><s%> earthquakes <S%G4578><s%> shall be in divers places, <S%G5117><s%> and famines, <S%G3042><s%> and pestilences; <S%G3061><s%> and fearful <S%G5400><s%> sights <S%G5400><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> shall there be from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But before <S%G4253><s%> all <S%G537><s%> these, <S%G5130><s%> they shall lay <S%G1911><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you, and persecute <S%G1377><s%> you, delivering <S%G3860><s%> you up to the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and into prisons, <S%G5438><s%> being brought <S%G71><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> and rulers <S%G2232><s%> for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake. <S%G1752><s%>
And it shall turn <S%G576><s%> to you for a testimony. <S%G3142><s%>
Settle <S%G5087><s%> it therefore <S%G3767><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> not to meditate <S%G4304><s%> before <S%G4304><s%> what you shall answer: <S%G626><s%>

For I will give <S%G1325><s%> you a mouth <S%G4750><s%> and wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> adversaries <S%G480><s%> shall not be able <S%G1410><s%> to gainsay <S%G471><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> resist. <S%G436><s%>

And you shall be betrayed <S%G3860><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> by parents, <S%G1118><s%> and brothers, <S%G80><s%> and kinfolks, <S%G4773><s%> and friends; <S%G5384><s%> and some of you shall they cause <S%G2289><s%> to be put <S%G2289><s%> to death. <S%G2289><s%>
And you shall be hated <S%G3404><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake.
But there shall not an hair <S%G2359><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>
In your <S%G5216><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> possess <S%G2932><s%> you your <S%G5216><s%> souls. <S%G5590><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> you shall see <S%G1492><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> compassed <S%G2944><s%> with armies, <S%G4760><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> that the desolation <S%G2050><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> is near. <S%G1448><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> let them which are in Judaea <S%G2449><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> to the mountains; <S%G3735><s%> and let them which are in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of it depart <S%G1633><s%> out; and let not them that are in the countries <S%G5561><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> thereinto. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>
For these <S%G3778><s%> be the days <S%G2250><s%> of vengeance, <S%G1557><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> things which <S%G3588><s%> are written <S%G1125><s%> may be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

But woe <S%G3759><s%> to them that are with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and to them that give suck, <S%G2337><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days! <S%G2250><s%> for there shall be great <S%G3173><s%> distress <S%G318><s%> in the land, <S%G1093><s%> and wrath <S%G3709><s%> on this <S%G5129><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

And they shall fall <S%G4098><s%> by the edge <S%G4750><s%> of the sword, <S%G3162><s%> and shall be led <S%G163><s%> away captive <S%G163><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations: <S%G1484><s%> and Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> shall be trodden <S%G3961><s%> down of the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the times <S%G2540><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

And there shall be signs <S%G4592><s%> in the sun, <S%G2246><s%> and in the moon, <S%G4582><s%> and in the stars; <S%G798><s%> and on the earth <S%G1093><s%> distress <S%G4928><s%> of nations, <S%G1484><s%> with perplexity; <S%G640><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> and the waves <S%G4535><s%> roaring; <S%G2278><s%>

Men's <S%G444><s%> hearts <S%G674><s%> failing <S%G674><s%> them for fear, <S%G5401><s%> and for looking <S%G4329><s%> after <S%G4329><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which are coming <S%G1904><s%> on <S%G1904><s%> the earth: <S%G3625><s%> for the powers <S%G1411><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> shall be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

And then <S%G5119><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in a cloud <S%G3507><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> and great <S%G4183><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And when these <S%G5130><s%> things begin <S%G756><s%> to come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, then look <S%G352><s%> up, and lift <S%G1869><s%> up your <S%G5216><s%> heads; <S%G2776><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%> draws near. <S%G1448><s%>
And he spoke <S%G2036><s%> to them a parable; <S%G3850><s%> Behold <S%G1492><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the trees; <S%G1186><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> they now <S%G2235><s%> shoot <S%G4261><s%> forth, <S%G4261><s%> you see <S%G991><s%> and know <S%G1097><s%> of your <S%G1438><s%> own selves <S%G1438><s%> that summer <S%G2330><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> at <S%G1451><s%> hand.

So <S%G3779><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> you, when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G1492><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, know <S%G1097><s%> you that the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is near <S%G1451><s%> at <S%G1451><s%> hand.
Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, This <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> shall not pass <S%G3928><s%> away, till <S%G2193><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> be fulfilled. <S%G1096><s%>
Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> shall pass <S%G3928><s%> away: but my words <S%G3056><s%> shall not pass <S%G3928><s%> away.

And take heed <S%G4337><s%> to yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> at <S%G3379><s%> any <S%G3379><s%> time <S%G3379><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> be overcharged <S%G925><s%> with surfeiting, <S%G2897><s%> and drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> and cares <S%G3308><s%> of this life, <S%G982><s%> and so that day <S%G2250><s%> come <S%G2186><s%> on you unawares. <S%G160><s%>

For as a snare <S%G3803><s%> shall it come <S%G1904><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that dwell <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the whole <S%G3956><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Watch <S%G69><s%> you therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and pray <S%G1189><s%> always, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2540><s%> that you may be accounted <S%G2661><s%> worthy <S%G2661><s%> to escape <S%G1628><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things that shall come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, and to stand <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

And in the day <S%G2250><s%> time <S%G2250><s%> he was teaching <S%G1321><s%> in the temple; <S%G2411><s%> and at night <S%G3571><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out, and stayed <S%G835><s%> in the mount <S%G3735><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> the mount of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> came <S%G3719><s%> early <S%G3719><s%> in the morning to him in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> for to hear <S%G191><s%> him.
